title: 94/558/ECSC: Commission Decision of 17 June 1994 on the conclusion of the Convention defining the Statute of the European Schools
header:
17.8.1994 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 212/15
COMMISSION DECISION
of 17 June 1994
on the conclusion of the Convention defining the Statute of the European Schools
(94/558/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Convention defining the Statute of the European Schools is hereby approved on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community. The text of the Convention is attached hereto (1).
The President of the Commission shall deposit the instrument of approval in accordance with Article 33 of the Convention.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 17 June 1994.
For the Commission
The President
Jacques DELORS
(1)  See page 3 of this Official Journal.
